snippet: Couples have been increasingly getting married away from home, but experts in the hospitality industry say there is no such thing as the so-called free wedding.
abstract: Resorts offer many incentives to couples looking to have a destination wedding, but experts in the hospitality industry warn that a good deal often comes at the expense of the guests.
lead_paragraph: Couples have been increasingly getting married away from home, but experts in the hospitality industry say there is no such thing as the so-called free wedding.

headline.seo: Free Destination Weddings Aren’t Totally Free
headline.main: Paying the Hidden Cost of a Destination Wedding
headline.print_headline: Paying the Hidden Cost Of a Destination Wedding
